value.string: This BOT will be creating policies in CL WC App, based upon the input files
This BOT will firstly get the configurations from Config.XML
Based on the configurations read, it will call the sub bots to perform input operations on the CL App screens
In case of any error while processing, BOT may stop processing for the particular input data file
For all passed files, BOT will create output XML files in the format: 'transactionguid_complete.xml' under 'output folder'
------- STEP: 1. Read Configuration from Config.XML using Read Configuration Bot
------- STEP: 2. Check if there are files to process in Input folder
